msContents.summary: Leaf with text of Deuteronomy XV, 6-XVI, 10, with Masorah, in Ashkenazic square script.

msItem.title: Manuscript leaf of most of Deuteronomy XV, 6-XVI, 10, with Masorah

history.provenance: Formerly held in the Library of the Dropsie College for Hebrew and Cognate Learning; given to Dropsie College by David Werner Amram in 1924.
